description:
runtime: fix SI_USER for FreeBSD
Ref: http://svnweb.freebsd.org/base/head/sys/sys/signal.h?revision=HEAD&view=markup

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

to see the problem in action:
start some long running go program on FreeBSD/386, send a SIGILL to it
and it will receive SIGSEGV instead of SIGILL (sigfault in sighandler).

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=283f6087807b ***

runtime: fix SI_USER for FreeBSD
Ref: http://svnweb.freebsd.org/base/head/sys/sys/signal.h?revision=HEAD&view=markup

R=golang-dev, devon.odell, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6490118

subject: code review 6490118: runtime: fix SI_USER for FreeBSD
